thread.title: BrainGate 2 implants allow paralyzed Cleveland veteran to move limb (video)
thread.title_full: BrainGate 2 implants allow paralyzed Cleveland veteran to move limb (video)

author: Julie Washington, The Plain Dealer
title: BrainGate 2 implants allow paralyzed Cleveland veteran to move limb (video)
text: Experimental brain and muscle implants called BrainGate2 allowed quadriplegic veteran Bill Kochevar of Cleveland to grasp a cup for the first time since he suffered a major spinal cord injury
